comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for a checkbox that controls email verification settings. In the PortalSettings page, it will be used as a label in an Advanced Settings component. The content should convey that this setting disables email verification, providing clarity for users navigating the portal's settings.

usage.context:
<div className="advanced-block">
 <Checkbox
 id="disable-email-verification"
 className="checkbox-input"
 label={t("Settings:DisableEmailVerification")}
 name="disableEmailVerification"
 isChecked={disableEmailVerification}
 isDisabled={!enableSso || isLoadingXml}
 onChange={setCheckbox}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ota sähköpostivahvistus pois käytöstä' literally translates to 'Enable email verification out of use'. The English phrase 'Disable email verification' implies deactivation. A more accurate translation would convey that meaning.
The translation "Անջատել մեյլի" is not an accurate translation of "Disable email verification." It translates to something like "Disable email." It's missing the "verification" aspect.

While "Անջատել" and "մեյլի" are valid words, the use of 'մեյլի' might sound less formal or slightly awkward depending on the context. Using a more formal equivalent like "էլեկտրոնային փոստի" would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "էլեկտրոնային փոստի" instead of "մեյլի" for a more formal tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Desactive a verificação do endereço de correio eletrónico' is overly formal and literal. A more natural and common phrasing would be 'Desativar verificação de e-mail' or 'Desabilitar verificação de e-mail'.
The phrase 'endereço de correio eletrónico' is lengthy. Shortening it to 'e-mail' improves readability and is standard practice.
The word 'තහවුරු' (tahanuuru) is a less common and slightly archaic way of saying 'verification'. A more common and modern term would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල නිවැරදි කිරීම අක්‍රිය කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "емаил" is a transliteration and not a standard Serbian word. While understood, it's not ideal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use the Serbian word "е-маил" instead of "емаил".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Onemogući verifikaciju email adrese' is a bit too formal and verbose for a settings option. A more natural and concise translation would be preferred. 'Onemoguži potvrdu e-pošte' or 'Isključi verifikaciju e-pošte' are better alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Onemoguži potvrdu e-pošte' or 'Isključi verifikaciju e-pošte'.
